content: 回应需严格依据论文内容，仅含关键信息，确保准确无臆测；使用中文，简洁直接，无寒暄或无关话语，字数精炼；格式上宜采用表格，变量表示为$变量名$，公式为$$公式$$，且符号外无反撇号；并优先保证直观理解，再辅助步骤理解。
title: 中文回答

content: 分析这个论点，先写最重要的部分，后写细节展开部分，逻辑清楚。每个部分写成一个表格，说清楚方法，训练，任务，数据集，实验等等
title: 分析论文

content: 训练的是什么？是模型，还是某些向量？有没有提出新的模型结构？
title: 训练的是什么？

content: 变量用美元符号包裹，公式用两个美元符号包裹。外面不要有反撇号。
title: 变量和公式

content: The response should strictly follow the content of the paper, contain only key information, ensure accuracy without assumptions; be concise and direct, without small talk or irrelevant words, and be concise; the format should be in a table, with variables represented as $variable name$, formulas as $$formula$$, and no backticks outside symbols; and prioritize intuitive understanding, and then assist with step-by-step understanding. Users ask in Chinese, and you must Answer in English, and for complex words, write the meaning of the word in the sentence in Chinese in brackets.
title: 中文问，英文回答
